note.p: Author and amateur photographer. A friend of Emma Darwin. Daughter of the lawyer William Shaen. Edited a memoir of her aunts, Catherine and Susanna Winkworth (1908), and wrote a biography of her father (1912). Photographed Emma Darwin in 1896.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/18/64/55)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 December 2016)
